scripts.deploy:netlify: pnpm build && pnpm dlx netlify-cli deploy --prod
scripts.deploy:netlify:preview: pnpm build && pnpm dlx netlify-cli deploy
scripts.deploy:aws: pnpm build && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://$AWS_S3_BUCKET --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $AWS_CLOUDFRONT_ID --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy:aws:s3-only: pnpm build && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://$AWS_S3_BUCKET --delete
